query: select top(1) PerC.UniqueId Ent, '-' OR1 from PersonCards PerC where PerC.IsDeleted != 1 and PerC.RH = '-1'
select top(1) PerC.UniqueId Ent, '+' OR1 from PersonCards PerC where PerC.IsDeleted != 1 and PerC.RH = '1'
select top(1) PerC.UniqueId Ent, '' OR1 from PersonCards PerC where PerC.IsDeleted != 1 and PerC.RH is null
